name: Personal Bookmarks: Slimmer Bookmarks and Toolbar
description:
I've hand-picked some of my favorite bookmarks toolbar / personal toolbar styles from a variety of different existing userstyles as well as a few of my own fresh-baked styles found by trial and error through the DOM Inspector.

Key Points:
* No personal toolbar dropmarkers.
* Smaller personal toolbar font size (0.85em)
* Smaller margin between navigation bar and personal toolbar.
additional_info: Update: 2012.03.29 - Created new style (this style), based on one of my older userstyles, style 40307.
